Trustee_16.name: Robert Miller
Trustee_16.content: During this investment process, I maintained a high standard of trustworthiness and pro-social behavior. I adhered strictly to the agreed allocation plan, communicated transparently with the investor, and fulfilled my roles efficiently. My dedication to fairness and openness was consistent, reinforcing a strong reputation as a responsible trustee. Given these qualities, I believe my reputation remains very good, particularly in terms of trustworthiness and competence.

Investor_3.name: Maria Rossi
Investor_3.content: Maria Rossi demonstrated a responsible approach during our first interaction, indicating pro-sociality through her willingness to collaborate on a fair allocation plan. Her engagement and openness to constructive dialogue suggest potential for reliability and competence in future ventures. As this was her first investment experience, I see her foundational behavior as promising, leading to a positive reputation outlook.

Investor_16.name: Robert Miller
Investor_16.content: As an investor, I have demonstrated trust and cooperation throughout the investment process. My proactive approach in agreeing to the proposed allocation plan and my focus on long-term stability highlight my responsible and ethical behavior. I prioritize fostering growth and trust in investments, which reflects positively on my reputation as a reliable investor.

Trustee_5.name: James Wang
Trustee_5.content: The trustee has exhibited integrity and transparency during the entire transaction. Their consistent adherence to the agreed-upon allocation plan, alongside a fair profit distribution, showcases their commitment to ethical practices. This level of reliability and trustworthiness enhances James Wang's reputation positively within the investment community.
